sys_update_version.name: catalog_ui_policy_de526c81c37f22104d7636dc050131af
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions/><catalog_item display_value="Adicionar Skill do colaborador">b5d506fbc32b2a104d7636dc0501317d</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><published_ref/><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
  var isAdminOrGestor =
    g_user.hasRole('admin') ||
    g_user.hasRole('x_snc_mock_skillup.admin') ||
    g_user.hasRole('x_snc_mock_skillup.gestor');

  var varName = 'colaborador';

  if (isAdminOrGestor) {
    // Admin/Gestor veem a variável (opcional)
    g_form.setDisplay(varName, true);
    g_form.setMandatory(varName, false); // deixe opcional
  } else {
    // Colaborador comum não vê e não é obrigatório
    g_form.setDisplay(varName, false);
    g_form.setMandatory(varName, false);
    g_form.setValue(varName, ''); // garante que não envia nada
  }
}
]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>esconde campo colaborador caso a permissão não seja admin ou gestor</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 11:50:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>de526c81c37f22104d7636dc050131af</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>esconde campo colaborador caso a permissão não seja admin ou gestor</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value=" Mock SkillUp" source="x_snc_mock_skillup">389364c69f9322107f44bcf72024ab3f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value=" Mock SkillUp">389364c69f9322107f44bcf72024ab3f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_de526c81c37f22104d7636dc050131af</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 11:56:18</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
